value: when loved ones die it's only natural to
wonder what's next but a Lebanon woman
says when her husband died she got
something she never expected she calls
it undeniable proof of the afterlife
from two of the last people you'd expect
Channel 4's Jennifer Johnson has her
story new at 10:00 when they Aldridge's
husband was in the final stages of
cancer he promised to send her a fax
from heaven she assumed it was a
morphine talking
so you can only imagine how shocked she
was when just days after his death he
made good on that promise I just
believed against all odds that God would
heal him death is not the end Faye
Aldridge is a woman of strong faith when
her husband Burke was diagnosed with
cancer in 2005 she fully expected God to
perform a miracle I expressed my faith I
covered him in the word of God I read
the Bible to him every day but just 21
days later the 53 year old was dead and
the unthinkable began to unfold and he
said well your husband paid me a visit
the night that he died and at that at
that point I just I literally started
laughing I can tell you I did not I did
not imagine those that happened and
there was this bright light within hours
of being pronounced dead at the hospital
oncologist Carl Willis and neurosurgeon
Arthur Cushman two men who had never met
both swear Burke Aldridge paid them a
visit at their homes before either of
them knew he was dead when I saw him he
was holding his arms up in the air like
this
he appeared in light surrounded by this
light joy and peace me pretty much it
kind of shared with me that he was at
peace and everything was okay so maybe
it was his way of saying you know told
you so you know I don't know
in both cases Burks visit was brief and
his message was concise he said this is
wonderful so don't ever don't ever worry
about about dying I just pretty much
knew what had happened I knew who it was
and it was just amazing shortly before
his death Burke had made a promise to
reach out to his wife from heaven within
days of his death these doctors gave
their accounts to faith in a fax I
suppose he had a conversation with the
Lord and he wanted to really do one
finale and maybe this was it Burke was a
Christian and I believe that gives proof
that if you are a Christian you do end
up in heaven now faith says she believes
Burke appeared to two doctors instead of
her so people would actually believe her
story she's written a book about it
called real messages from heaven
and it was so popular it was picked up
last year by Walmart Jennifer Johnson
Channel 4 News
